sqlMap.select: select ID, ICON, TITLE, DESCRIPTION, NUMBER, RANK, PARENT, EXPERIENCE, MONEY, STRENGTHEN, HONOR, ADDSUCESS, DEFAULTOPEN, OPENMODULE, GIFT, UNIT, UNIT_TYPE, AMOUNT, STATUS from SYS_GROWTH_MISSION
sqlMap.insert:
insert into SYS_GROWTH_MISSION( ICON, TITLE, DESCRIPTION, NUMBER, RANK, PARENT, EXPERIENCE, MONEY, STRENGTHEN, HONOR, ADDSUCESS, DEFAULTOPEN, OPENMODULE, GIFT, UNIT, UNIT_TYPE, AMOUNT, STATUS ) values ( #icon#, #descriptionCN#, #number#, #rank#, #parent#, #experience#, #money#, #strengthen#, #honor#, #addSucess#, #defaultopen#, #openmodule#, #gift#, #unit#, #unitType#, #amount#, #status# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
sqlMap.update: update SYS_GROWTH_MISSION set ICON = #icon#, TITLE = #title#, DESCRIPTION = #descriptionCN#, NUMBER = #number#, RANK = #rank#, PARENT = #parent#, EXPERIENCE = #experience#, MONEY = #money#, STRENGTHEN = #strengthen#, HONOR = #honor#, ADDSUCESS = #addSucess#, DEFAULTOPEN = #defaultopen#, OPENMODULE = #openmodule#, GIFT = #gift#, UNIT = #unit#, UNIT_TYPE = #unitType#, AMOUNT = #amount#, STATUS = #status# where ID = #id#
